description:
Descriptors are often not that common to be found, compared to other
idioms (decorators, context managers, etc.). However, they provide a
powerful tool for improving our code, by enabling us to encapsulate
logic into different objects transparently.

The talk will cover the descriptor protocol, different types of
descriptors, and some examples where descriptors shine, yielding a
very elegant and efficient solution.
title: Discovering descriptors
